rules_text: At the beginning of combat on your turn, remove all -1/-1 counters from target creature you control. At the beginning of the next end step, distribute that many -1/-1 counters among creatures you control.
notes:
ARTed

Rank 1 - Surely this can't coexist with invoke, right? If we cut invoke, it's probably fine though!

I think Urgesh/Plagueborn create a Splinter Twin situation with the Avatars, where Plagueborn is more specifically that combo feel than Urgesh. I like two card combos and this one being gated by some strong color intensity felt okay.

That being said, I think it's right to identify both of these cards as potentially problematic. If we feel that Plagueborn is too strong with the GB Avatar then I'm cool with cutting it.
